0:
--------------------
Text: Hit Parade 2 is a compilation album by The Wedding Present released in January 1993.

Triplets:<Hit Parade 2
1:
--------------------
Text: Hit Parade 2:  Having decided to release a limited edition single every month for all of 1992 (each featuring an original track on the A side and a cover version on the B side) the group subsequently compiled the songs as two LPs called Hit Parade 1 and Hit Parade 2.
Triplets:<Hit Parade 2
2:
--------------------
Text: Hit Parade 2:  In 2003, a double CD was issued called simply "The Hit Parade".
